articles.title: ACEN, ib vogt plan 1,000-MW solar projects in Asia - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: AC ENERGY Corp. (ACEN) has partnered with German solar developer ib vogt to build at least 1,000-megawatt (MW) of renewable energy projects in the Asia-Pacific region, the Ayala-led company said on Monday.
